participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, enjoys deep conversations, and has a passion for nature.
participant_1.background: i'm partly deaf. i grow roses in my garden. i've a big library at home. i am a museum tour guide. i love to drink fancy tea.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Frustrated yet hopeful, seeks change in his life, and has a humorous outlook despite struggles.
participant_2.background: i'm 40 years old. i hate my job. my wife spends all my money. i work as a car salesman. i'm planning on getting a divorce.

content.text:
Buongiorno! Such a nice day! How are you?.
Cut a long story short: i'm partly deaf
Oh what happened to you? I am not so good, my wife is talking about divorce.
ll , i'm off of alot of coffee . sorry . i can tell this will be interesting
Do you like coffee ? I also hate my job so life is not really crazy right now I must say
i take my daugther to the part to get out the house . what do you do ?
I work as a car salesman and you ?
i am a female and i work as a mystery shopper , fun right ?
Sounds fun! How old is your daughter?
she is 1 and a half . do you have any children ?
No I don't and since we are planning to getting divorced I don't think we will anytime soon. Do you have other kids ?
hey it puts food on the the table. Also, try to guess: i grow roses ...
I can't guess, is it a story ?
i don't . and yes it is . my other is hobby is my job . love it .
what do you like about it ?
i am just a student currently but hoping to study law as well . do you have any hobbies ?
